test_cases=int(raw_input())

def make_lucky_number(given_number):
    validity=''
    i=0
    while True:
        if given_number==4:
            print 0
            break
        if given_number-i<7:
            print -1
            break
        if (given_number-i)%7==0:
            print given_number-i
            break
        i+=4

for i in xrange(test_cases):
    make_lucky_number(int(raw_input()))
